price: Mwenyezi Mungu aliwaandalia adhabu kali. Basi mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu, enyi wenye akili, mlio amini! Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu amekuteremshieni Ukumbusho,
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗاۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ قَدۡ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرٗا
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu amewaandalia watu wa miji ya watu walio fanya ujabari adhabu ya mwisho wa ukali. Basi tahadharini na ghadhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu, enyi wenye akili sawa, ambao mnasifika kwa Imani. Amekuteremshieni mtu mwenye utukufu na cheo,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum ʿadhāban shadīdan fa-ittaqū al-laha yāulī al-albābi alladhīna āmanū qad anzala al-lahu ilaykum dhik'ran
